title: Video Conferencing-Based English Interactive Project: Motivation, Confidence, and Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate English conversational skills and comprehension of fundamental academic terminology
context.additional_context: Accumulating real communication experiences through real-time video interactions with native speakers, strengthening cultural context understanding for employment preparation.

learning_goals: Within six months, learners can maintain spontaneous topic-based speech for at least 15 minutes in video conferences with native speakers.
After completing project-based tasks, learners demonstrate a 20% improvement in motivation survey scores and a 15% improvement in self-efficacy survey scores.

Learners incorporate three or more audio/written feedback sessions from native speakers, write a 10-page self-assessment portfolio adhering to APA format, and include two or more concrete examples demonstrating improved communication skills.

resources: Video conferencing platforms (Zoom/Teams), online collaboration tools (Notion/Miro), native speaker instructor pool, assessment rubrics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
